Battle Cards
View On FortressMaximus.io

Zap

  1. The rules state that when you play an action, you set it off to the side. When Optimus Prime - Battlefield Legend plays an action as part of his attack ability, is that card set aside, thus removing the pip from counting attack damage? Example: Prime flips Zap and Supercharge during his attack. He chooses to play Zap. Is his final attack value 9 or 10?
    The Zap gets set aside, but the orange icon would still increase the attack.
